column5: I am looking for suggestions on Lodges that are within 12 hours of driving that can be fly-in, drive in or boat in.  I will be with a group of 10 people.  We are planning on going in Late September or early October. Target species are Walleye and Pike. Any suggestions you have are appreciated!! I tried to search on the forum for topics but didn't get anywhere.
Just cut to the chase and PM Mike Borger. He's got a whole list( catalog??) of places he's gone!
Just cut to the chase and PM Mike Borger. He's got a whole list( catalog??) of places he's gone!  +1
PM answered, thanks for reaching out.
